person.persName: Ebenezer Davis Sawyer (San Francisco, California, attorney and judge)

body.p: San Francisco, California, attorney and judge. New York native. Married Lavinia T. Sawyer. Father of Anna L. Sawyer, William T. Sawyer, Carrie M. Sawyer, and Edely E. Sawyer. Moved to California in 1851. Attorney in San Francisco from 1852 to 1902. District judge for the 4th Judicial District of California in 1863 and 1864.
